Albert De La Fuente is a professional in the Information Technology field. Graduated as Engineer in Computer Science at the Universidad de Málaga at Málaga (Spain), considers himself an enthusiast of computers and technology.

I feel naturally atracted to: Libre/open source software, software development, embedded devices, networking, design, music, traveling, languages, photography, observing and thinking, and last but not least, The Bible.
